About.desc: Software Developer aspiring to become a Full-Stack Developer. Knowledgeable in JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, SQL, and ORMs.
About.desc2: I started programming in C in 2022 for microcontrollers. In 2023, I began my undergraduate studies in Computer Science, focusing mainly on the basics of Java, OOP, and SQL. At the end of 2024, I started working as a PHP developer for Conectalá.

Contact.info: Currently in a internship at Conectalá as a PHP developer.
